Anatomy of Substractive Synthesizers

Category: Audio Tags: Digital Synths
Mon, Nov 29, 21 Length: 1 min

This post is still incomplete ):

Despite the ever growing list of ways to form sound, I still find the traditional method of subtractive synthesis to be the most intuitive. What keeps me coming back something like the Microfreak, is how simple it is to get it sounding anyway you want.
